title: Quarkus Tools for IntelliJ 1.10.0 released!
content: We are very pleased to announce the 1.10.0 release of Quarkus Tools for IntelliJ. This release adds support for Quarkus run/debug configurations and provides several fixes (including security fixes). Quarkus configurations It is possible to run or debug a Quarkus application from the IDE configurations. Select the Run â†’ Edit...
